options: ['is very clever', 'has good eyes', 'is very strong', 'is very helpful']
article:
One day a rich man meets Tom. The rich man asks, "People say you are very clever  and nothing is difficult  for you. Can you tell my why you are so clever? " Tom answers with a smile, "Oh, I'm not clever. Instead  , you are too _ ." The rich man becomes very very angry.
Tom says, "Sir, please don't be angry. If you don't believe me, now let me ask you a very easy question: If you have a group of sheep , I send you another group. Then, you say, how many groups of sheep do you have?"
"Why! That's the easiest question in the world. One and one is two. Anybody knows _ . I have two groups of sheep , of course."
Tom laughs and says, "You are wrong , Sir. Two groups of sheep put together is still one group. That's the easiest question in the world , isn't it?"
